TopicTitle: Ask the Mods questions about the Forums!

Articles.Content: Why is the search 'feature' useless?
It's the standard vBulletin search engine, try the advanced search button.

> 
> Why is the search 'feature' useless?

It's actually not that useless once you get used to it. Still could use some improvements though.

But I'm afraid KSP forum admins or mods will not be able to do anything: the search engine may be forced by vBulletin.

> 
> If I wanted to advertise an RP that is on, say Skype, in order to find members, could I post it on the forums?

I believe we've had similar threads in the Space Lounge linking to offsite RP activities. Just keep the RP itself off this forum and it should be fine.

Don't know if this is the right place to ask, but I don't feel it justifies it's own thread, especially when the answer is probably going to be "it's a Firefox problem" 

Is there any sort of known issue with Firefox on Android and the forums?

The reason I ask, is earlier today, Firefox would not let me reply to a thread, either through "quick reply" (mobile format) or the full "go advanced" option. Weirdly, clicking the "Go Advanced" button worked - but it still wouldn't let me post. Chrome worked first time.

To be fair, it may well be my phone, but thought I'd mention it.

Can you get cited for backseat moderating in a "report post?"

> 
> Can you get cited for backseat moderating in a "report post?"

No. Backseat moderating is public (or in PM to another user). Reporting a post is when we'd like you to tell us why you think a post needs moderating.

> 
> Can you get cited for backseat moderating in a "report post?"

But you can be inflected for breaking other rules in your report, common sense applies.
